    static void readConfigFile()
    Initialize the item_list and set_list from a csv config file Config files (can edit) - PATH_ITEM = "./item_config.csv"; - PATH_SET = "./set_config.csv"; item_config format: title(YES) - name, price, type, description set_config format: title(YES) - name, items, price, description

  • Method Details

    • readConfigFile

      public static void readConfigFile() throws IOException
      Initialize the item_list and set_list from a csv config file Config files (can edit) - PATH_ITEM = "./item_config.csv"; - PATH_SET = "./set_config.csv"; item_config format: title(YES) - name, price, type, description set_config format: title(YES) - name, items, price, description
      Throws:
      IOException

    • add_update_menu_item

      public static void add_update_menu_item​(String name, double price, String type, String description)
      Add or update an item to the item_list (menu)
      Parameters:
      String - name: Name of item
      double - price: Price ofitem
      String - type: Type of item
      String - description: Descriptor of item

    • remove_menu_item

      public static boolean remove_menu_item​(String name)
      remove an item form item_list (menu)
      Parameters:
      String - name: name of the item to be removed from menu
      Returns:
      true: success

    • add_item_list_of_set

      public static HashMap<String,​Item> add_item_list_of_set​(String items_string)
      Process item_list string by finding corresponding items and quantity Then create a list of items
      Parameters:
      String - item_lists: name of the item to be removed from menu Example: Item1: Quantity1; Item2 : Quantity2
      Returns:
      a HashMap that contains items

    • add_update_menu_itemSet

      public static boolean add_update_menu_itemSet​(String name, HashMap<String,​Item> set_item_list, double price, String description)
      Add or update an promotion to the set_list (menu)
      Parameters:
      String - name: name of the promotion set
      HashMap - set_item_list: get from `add_item_list_of_set(items_string)`
      double - price: price of set
      String - description: description of file
      Returns:
      false: fail

    • remove_menu_item_itemSet

      public static boolean remove_menu_item_itemSet​(String name)
      remove an promotion form set_list (menu)
      Parameters:
      String - name: name of the promotion set to be removed form menu
